Reviews.Title: “Great find!”
Reviews.Author: flowerlady13
Reviews.Content: I have stayed a few times now at this motel and will continue to go back. The pool is very clean the rooms are clean and the staff friendly. My only criticisms are that the tvs need to be updated and the efficiency kitchens need restocked with cooking equipment (utensils,pans etc.) Overall great find!

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: LeisureLady1
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at Ocean Mecca-Room Type 2. Great location - on the boardwalk. Most rooms ocean view even if southern view. Lots of things within walking distance - restaurants, mini-golf, stores, rides, etc. The beach in front of the hotel very nice and the beachfront pool was very clean even at the end of the season. Room was small, decor dated. Nice flat screen TV. Loud unit air conditioners. grrr Couch pullouts extremely lumpy. No hairdryer, shampoo, conditioner, lotion. Not a problem but should be noted on website. Free ice offered next to office,not convenient. Office staff a little rude regarding rules for no guests, no visitors, no one but registered guests which is understandable but we are in our 60's and 2am partying "ain't happenin' I was helping 14 other friends/family move in to their rooms and when I went to check on my room, they demanded to know why and who's key I had and reminded me of the rules. Their website virtual tour does not function. Required $10 deposit for each key issued. Don't leave keys in room, remember to ask for deposit back. Housekeeping staff very friendly. Free public parking right next door (in case you have visitors....shhhh) All in all, price was right for what and where it is!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very comfortable, quiet hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Mako411
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Ocean Mecca and was very pleased with the hotel. It was in a great location - on the boardwalk but away from all the loud noise and crowds. Everything was within walking distance - restaurants, mini-golf, stores, rides, etc. The beach in front of the hotel was very nice and the pool was great. The staff were all very friendly and the room was clean. The only thing we wished we had in the room was a refridgerator. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking to spend a nice relaxing vacation in ocean city!

Reviews.Title: “Ready To Go Back!!!”
Reviews.Author: mngal15
Reviews.Content: My husband and I went to Ocean City, MD, to celebrate his 70th birthday. We just picked up and left without hotel reservations. Arriving in Ocean City, we stopped at a few places, but just weren't satisfied with the location and/or the cleanliness. Then we found Ocean Mecca. We spent 5 days and 4 nights there. The rooms were quiet, near the ocean, near the pool, near the boardwalk, and near the busline. Also, the Embers Restaurant is just across the street. The pool at Ocean Mecca is worth mentioning. It is located in the courtyard area and gets sun all day long. Nice size and plenty of seating. Rooms were nothing special, but comfortable. Front desk service was good. There is a $10 refundable deposit per key requested. Bring your own beach towels. Exterior area is kept VERY clean. Someone is always dumping garbage cans or sweeping parking lot and sidewalk areas.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Tracy P
Reviews.Content: My family & I stayed for 4 days and were very pleased with everything. The bathroom seemed recently renovated & was spotless!! I loved this. The pool & view from the 2nd floor was fantastic. The housekeeping was excellent & friendly - kept the sand swept up & had plenty of clean towels. The front desk was very friendly & helpful. Plenty of parking & the balcony was very nice & clean. Room was a little small for 4 of us - maybe we need to rent a bigger room - could of used a little more storage - but would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Rude Managers and Staff way overpriced”
Reviews.Author: Daisy S
Reviews.Content: Had a fun time at ocean city , however as the other reviews I found it very overpriced for room not comfortable with no hair dryers very old Tvs and the management and staff was not helpful and they were very rude. We paid $1600 for a 3 day stay (2 rooms) and after they got our money they could care less about our needs. DO NOT RECOMMEND!

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret”
Reviews.Author: Wintertraveler51
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a 4 day stay in Ocean city. Stayed at the Ocean Mecca which is located right on the boardwalk with the pool right beside the boardwalk. The pool is great and gives you a great view of the ocean while also enjoying the pool. The hotel is family run so its operation is well supervised and the guest rules are monitored so everyone can enjoy their stay. The motel is very clean and very well maintained. We have stayed at the Ocean Mecca many times in the past and also tried other motels, but we feel that this is the best value for out money. We have stayed at some of the newer high rise hotels only to be dissapointed by the lack of friendliness or helpfulness at other hotels. We even had belongings stolen at one of the other high rise hotels which was owned by foreigners and we had an extremely had time trying to get them to reimburse us for the stolen articles. Our belongings were in their care when they went misssing and we could not even get them to review their security cameras. We have never had an concerns with leaving anything in out rooms during our stays at the Ocean Mecca. My hyusband noted that many of the staff are the same as when we stayed there years ago. I made our reservations on Wednesday night and was arriving Thursday. The young man who answered the phone on Wednesday night quoted me a price for Thursay night and another price for Friday and Saturday night, which was going to be about $35.00 more each of the two weekend nights ( as is frequently the case & I was agreeable to ). However, when I arrived I was informed that the price I was quoted was wrong and the price for Friday and Saturday night was not going to be any more than the rate for Thursday night. What a pleasant surprise. They were very honest and could have very easily charged me the additional amount. I would just have to think that anyone with negative comments probably does not like to follow the rules which are enforced by the management to make everyone stay more enjoyable. We have been coming here on and off for the past 25 years. Will come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice little mom and pop motel.”
Reviews.Author: meansabreen
Reviews.Content: We chose Ocean Mecca as our motel due to the great price and for the fact that it was right on the beach and boardwalk. The only thing I didn't like about the location was that we were further down on the boardwalk than I thought. Most of the restaurants and other attractions are down further so we did quite a bit of walking! The room is small but always kept clean, the people at the desk were very nice and the pool area was great too! I'd most likely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place”
Reviews.Author: Teresa L
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at Ocean Mecca since the 1980's. I find it very hard to believe the negative comments I have read. This motel is very family/kid oriented and they do promote safety & honesty at their establishment which makes me feel very comfortable. The staff is excellent; very kind, friendly & helpful. I have stayed in different rooms over the yrs and have never seen bugs or dirt at this motel. I will continue to stay at Ocean Mecca, it is like home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Rate/Good Location”
Reviews.Author: lbidetti
Reviews.Content: We just stayed at Ocean Mecca for 3 nights for SunFest. Good rates, clean and so easy to take the tram to the busy end of the boardwalk. Nothing fancy but served the purpose well. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Had an excellent time!!!!”
Reviews.Author: TeamRoberts2011
Reviews.Content: Labor Day weekend 2011--great stay! My husband and i hosted a girlfriend, my mother and grandmother in one of Ocean Mecca's oceanfront suites and we had a fantastic time! Rooms were clean, we had two bathrooms well stocked w/towells, soap, and toilet paper, well stock kitchen to include blender, toaster, slow cooker, pots and pans, AND enough utensils for the entire family!! Two pull out sofas and two double beds, 4 patio chairs and a lounger..we borrowed an extra lounger from the pool area to round things out. Check-in was a breeze even though it was kinda wierd that they didnt take online reservations or cc over the phone. Not a showstopper though. The hotel uses actual KEYS and not electronic cards so there is a $10 deposit per key. They allowed us to park two cars in the lot and they seem to have ample parking---more than i can say for The Dunes Motel. Pool is decent size, not at all overcrowded and right on the boardwalk. Place was very quiet..no rowdiness at all!! We all loved having the excellent access to the beach, our vehicles, and some of our fav places to eat and shop! Housekeeping staff was friendly and kept our floor swept of sand and fresh towells whenever we needed them. Thank you, thank you Ocean Mecca for a great experience!! PS--yes, we c the fly swatter hanging n the bedroom but, i have NO IDEA why its there? Had balcony door open all weekend and didnt c one fly/roach/anything! Will b recommending motel staff remove.

Reviews.Title: “Love this hotel”
Reviews.Author: momeagle36
Reviews.Content: I feel i need to respond to a few of the negative reviews, first Ihave stayed at the Ocean Mecca on several occasions other than a fly I have NEVER seen a bug in any of the rooms I have stayed in and I have stayed in several. The staff are always pleasant & willing to help the guests but yes there are rules & they are there for a reason for the paying guests so that the place is not overtaken by non paying persons, If you want to sneak someone onto the property go somewehre else where you are not likely to be noticed, My family comes here time & time again because it is a family oriented Motel you are made to feel like family and as long as you obey the rules there are no problems. yet again we had another great time even though it was just a very short trip it was so nice to see the friendly faces of Neal & Amy cant wait to come back again nexy year so looking forward to another relaxing time.

Reviews.Title: “We had a horrible experience here”
Reviews.Author: schomaker
Reviews.Content: Great beach, great vacation but this was a horrible place to stay. The rooms and extras were fine but the staff was horrible. They watched every little thing you did and yelled at our kids. Oh, FYI this is not a kid friendly place. We had family come for a day trip and they were not even allowed on the property. Yes they were actually told to leave even when we explained the situation to the owners. The room had roaches and stank. My advice is to stay at a bigger hotel so the staff isnt watching your every move.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy!”
Reviews.Author: Dabbydawg3
Reviews.Content: This place is no frills but very clean, well-maintained, great rates for oceanfront hotel. The pool was clean and Literally right on the boardwalk so you could sit on the pool deck and look at the ocean and beach. Young dark haired gal at the front desk was extremely nice and helpful and so was the Irish student working for the summer. These kids did a great job and we appreciated their advise. I would stay here again! ( this is a two story small hotel but the location was great)

Reviews.Title: “great-will always stay there”
Reviews.Author: babyinoct
Reviews.Content: We have been to ocean city many, many times.Experienced many different types of accomodations, most from internet ads were deceiving. Even the larger hotels had dirty rooms and lots of room for improvement needed. What we hate the most is dealing with people who make you seem like a bother rather than a customer. And dealing with all foriegners that don't understand what you are asking for is very frustrating. Please hire Americans people! But when we stayed at Ocean Mecca we were treated almost like royalty. We immediately felt comfortable and welcome. The place is small but very clean. Probably the cleanest we have seen in OC. Although our trip was about a year ago, I just felt we had to write because of a couple reviews I have read here. We truly believe there is more to the stories than is being said. Don't pay attention to the sour grapes written. It was probably someone that was reprimanded for violating rules or misunderstood something. And to the person with flys, we have experienced flys at the beach at certain times of the year. And many times I wished I had a flyswatter! We do know that they have different types of rooms and we upgraded for a few dollars more and was very satisfied.We can only say that we were very pleased with the hotel and will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: darbabe1
Reviews.Content: A group of us girls go every year to OC. We've had some bad experiences with motels! Then we went to Ocean Mecca and have been going there every since! We love it! The lady at the front desk is great, the rooms are clean and roomy and the pool is kept up. We are right on the boardwalk and it is fantastic! This is our place to go from now on!

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: oceancityColumbia
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with my stay at the Mecca Hotel. From the moment my friends and I arrived at the hotel, we were being watched by the staff at the front desk. About five times throughout the entire trip, management came knocking on our door to demand that the correct number of people were in the room, and also to demand that the housekeeping cleaned the room, even when the "Privacy Please" sign was up, and the correct number was there. Also, on day three, they asked us all for our ID’s, something they should have done on the first day. They did not give us a reason. They then went in our room (after housekeeping was completed much earlier that morning) without asking us. I found this behavior unprofessional considering we were faulty accused of wrongs from day one. Although one of our friends was over twenty three and most of us were nineteen- adult age- we were treated like we were twelve year olds. Also, keep in mind that no guests are allowed on the premises, even if they are visiting for a couple of minutes. This added an unnecessary stress to our vacation. Although the rooms were generally clean and the maids were nice, that did not compensate for the rude and unprofessional staff. DO NOT stay at this hotel if you are with a group of friends and trying to have an enjoyable vacation. In all my vacations I have never been treated this way at a hotel; and the four hundred plus dollars spent there went to waste.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: nynic46
Reviews.Content: I booked the Ocean Mecca after doing extensve research on-line about accommodations in OC, it was our first time in OC and I'm very glad we stayed at the Ocean Mecca! Compared to other hovels on the board walk we breathed a huge sigh of relief. It's in a nice quiet location on the boardwalk with an awesome pool. The rooms were SPOTLESS and kept very clean every day by the super friendly staff. It was good value, not super cheap but I was happy to pay the price for the cleanliness, we have a baby and a 4 year old. My son is still talking about it and we are going back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great value on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: cubsgirl6153
Reviews.Content: The Ocean Mecca was a great fit for us for a last-minute getaway before school started. This is a great location - right on the boardwalk, short walk to the stores and restaurants. Beach was very convenient - could be there in 3 minutes! The pool is definitely the nicest we saw along the boardwalk. Room was a little small but we didn't spend much time there anyway.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Time at the Ocean Mecca”
Reviews.Author: momeagle36
Reviews.Content: I was a llittle concerned after reading the last 2 post that things had changed at the Ocean Mecca Motel but I was pleasently surprised to find that things are the same as the last time my husband and I had been there. We were greated with a pleasent smile and a warm welcome from Sal despite the fact that we arrived well before check in time we were told our room would be ready in 45 minutes at 1:15 PM and it was ready just as promised. The room was pleantly big for the 3 of us and the room was well maintained by the housekeeping staff we asked for extra towels and wash cloths and they were there for us each day the pool was fantastic because the beach was closed due to Hurricaine Bill. I was also glad to see Neal's friendly face on the day after our arrival she made us feel like family Cant wait to go back there again next year

Reviews.Title: “Over Priced and not very Honest”
Reviews.Author: KL1974
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights, and while the room was very small, it was very clean and close to everything. We did enjoy our stay, even with the kids upstairs running around and sounding like they were coming through the ceiling at any moment. However, when I inquired about a room for a relative who would be arriving over the weekend, I was told by Neil that I should call on the Thursday of that week, and she could give me a "deal" on the price, because they don't drop their prices until late in the week if they're not filled up. She was very convincing that the "deal" would happen. When I called on Thursday, she in fact did have a room available, but now she said that they wouldn't be able to drop the rate till they arrived on Friday. I booked it for them, and when they did arrive, they of course now say they had to pay full price. $260 each night. Being that they didn't want to take the time to find another more reasonable price, they paid. Upon entering the room, they find that they paid "full price" for a room with no refrigerator. No table and chairs, only a desk that served as the dresser to put their clothing in. They asked at the desk for a room with the frig, and were told that the cost of that room would be $320 per night. That's absolutely ridiculous!!!! They had rooms available, because they were NOT sold out.... but would not move them. While I said that this was a nice "little" hotel, that is true, but to be so dishonest to me about what they could provide for my family member, only to get me to take the room, is inexcusable. My family most certainly could have had another room at another motel, just as nice, with a frig, and all the amenities, for ALOT LESS than what they had to pay at this one. Their dishonesty to me is something I will NEVER forget, and I certainly will NOT stay there again because of the deceit. I made a HUGE mistake in recommending this to our family member, and in the future, I will certainly stay in other hotels that I've had pleasant experiences at, and in Ocean CIty, there are many..... I could go on and on about this whole situation, but this is the short version of what happened. Shame on the staff at the Ocean Mecca!!!!! I booked this because of all the great reviews, but never again. It's a small, very "basic" hotel that in NO WAY would warrant the over-priced amount they charged.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent find! Close to the boardwalk and beach.”
Reviews.Author: nyrlisa35
Reviews.Content: The Ocean Mecca is a great place to stay. The rooms were impeccably clean and the maids kept them clean daily. The bathrooms were very clean as well and the staff friendly. The pool was nice and clean too. It is walking distance to the beach and boardwalk. The only one complaint I have is that the air conditioner in the room was a bit loud. Other than that, I recommend this place, two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Good Find”
Reviews.Author: Hedgin08
Reviews.Content: Went there for a little getaway in the Fall of '07. The staff were friendly upon check-in/out. Room was in need of some updating but very clean! We stayed for 3 nights and had a nice quiet time! Looking forward to our next trip in August!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Family Motel on the Boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: firstmom
Reviews.Content: Just returned from OC over the 4th of July. Our stay at Ocean Mecca was wonderful. The rooms are basic, but very clean. The office staff was very nice and the maid service was exceptional. There is a large pool on the boardwalk with a sundeck and the motel has a great location. I would definately recommend this motel to anyone who is looking for a nice family oriented stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very well kept.....I would stay again!!!”
Reviews.Author: NEWT1567
Reviews.Content: This motel is like a small older "mom and pop" motel. Our room and the motel grounds are kept very very clean and freshly painted. There is always someone cleaning something. Room 206 that we had was a little bit on the smaller size than average but what else do you need than a shower and a bed to sleep in because you are usually at the nice pool, beach, or boardwalk anyway. The beds were comfortable and so were the pillows. It is true what was stated in another review....they do wash the comforters!! How do I know? --We checked in early and the maid service brought freshly washed comforters to put on the beds! The maid service was in our room cleaning in the one AM after breakfast, when one of our kids needed to use the bathroom. We slipped in to use the bathroom and to my amazement everything was being freshly sprayed and soaked with disinfectant cleaner in the bathroom! Needless to say the cleaning staff does a outstanding job!!! The motel is right on the boardwalk right by the beach. You can sit at the pool by the boardwalk and people watch and admire the beach and ocean at the same time. Pool area is decent size and also kept clean. The motel being on the boardwalk/beach is also good because when your on the beach with the kids everything is right there a short walk away. My overall opinion of the motel=it's a SOLID place to stay. It's not a big place, but bigger is not always better. It's very functionable in a good locationand well kept. I would recommend it and would definitley stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and simple”
Reviews.Author: aflane
Reviews.Content: This motel isn't that much to look at... just a simple motel. But the amenities and cleanliness make up for the simple motel feel. It's a 2 story, double strip, old fashioned motel. There's a nice sized parking lot in front of the motel units, AND there's a very HUGE additional lot just across the street. Checking in was a breeze. I haven't stayed at a hotel/motel in quite a long times, where I had to fill out a registration card. It was kind of quaint. <lol> We stepped into our room to be pleasantly surprised with the amenities. We were expecting a bed, tv and bathroom. What we found was the bed, tv, bathroom, a mini-fridge, microwave, small table w/chairs to eat at, and plenty of room to move around. And the best thing that we found... NO mildew smell!!! The room was clean, clean, clean, and had no residual odors of any kind. This is extremely rare at OC-MD. The motel is located on the Boardwalk, around 4 blocks from the end. The tram-car runs past every 10 minutes or so, but the city bus is cheaper. The beach is lifeguarded, but weather conditions were just too chilly to enjoy it. There is a small swimming pool right on the Boardwalk, but again, the weather was not permitting. We did take a look at the pool, very clean and well maintained. Overall, an extremely pleasant stay. We'll go back in the future!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, but...”
Reviews.Author: liverlady
Reviews.Content: This motel was clean, however, they allow smoking. The rooms really smelled, especially when we turned on the a/c. Otherwise, it was clean.

Reviews.Title: “just a simple little motel”
Reviews.Author: jzam
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Ocean Mecca Motel was very pleasing. The location is the best for all reasons. Plenty of parking, right on the boardwalk, great pool on boardwalk, walking distance to anything. I will definitely go back when I can. The rooms are clean and reasonable. I only wish they had coffee in the rooms or in the office. But I guess I can use the exercise.

Reviews.Title: “clean little gem”
Reviews.Author: wangoBaltimore
Reviews.Content: what a very nice place. wish we found this motel many trips ago. quiet, clean, excellent location right on boardwalk and not a cold rude chain hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: ktygrr
Reviews.Content: Our 6th year at Ocean City we found ourselves at a great little Motel called The Ocean Mecca. We stayed in one of the efficiencies because we always look for a room where we can cook our meals. This place was clean, the staff was super friendly and my daughter loved the pool. We are definately going to try and stay there again next year.

HotelInfo.Name: Ocean Mecca Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 2304 Baltimore Ave, Ocean City, MD 21842
